purpose: Facilitates the creation and management of autonomous AI agents with enhanced resilience and observability
principle: Built on Dapr's distributed application runtime, leveraging its capabilities for state management, pub/sub, and observability
reusability: Modular architecture with support for plug-and-play components, APIs for integration with existing systems
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may lack comprehensive documentation and stability for production use
name: dapr-agents
description: Build autonomous, resilient and observable AI agents with built-in workflow orchestration, security, statefulness and telemetry.
highlight: Combines workflow orchestration, security, statefulness, and telemetry for autonomous AI agents
